entities.name: hedwig
entities.description: Harry's owl, Hedwig is mentioned as being motionless and pathetic on the floor of her cage. Harry refuses to believe that she is dead.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is mentioned as blasting through a circle of hooded Death Eaters on his motorbike.

entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: A group of people are mentioned as scattering as Hagrid blasts through their circle.

relationships.description: Hagrid is blasting through a circle of Death Eaters on his motorbike.
Harry is concerned for Hedwig's safety and refuses to believe that she is dead.
